description.attr1: Alters the visual aspect of the 'space skybox' with ones designed to more closely mimic 'normal' human vision.
This skybox pack is how space is often portrayed in fiction and media. Realistically human vision would need to perceive a far wider spectrum of light to begin to grasp the majesty of the universe.
As more and more Stubs started the re-integration the demand for these types of products increased.
